oracle.pg.text.solr

Class SolrEdgeIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.text.solr.SolrIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
      • oracle.pg.text.solr.SolrEdgeIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Index<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>, OracleIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>

    public class SolrEdgeIndex
extends SolrIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
    This class extends the functions defined in SolrIndex. It manages manual indexes defined on Edge objects using SolrCloud.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public com.tinkerpop.blueprints.CloseableIterable<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge> get(java.lang.Object solrQuery)
        Gets an Iterable object with all the matching elements that match the given query object. This object can be either a String text search query, a SolrQuery object or a QueryResponse from SolrCloud.
        Specified by:
        get in interface OracleIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
        Specified by:
        get in class SolrIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
        Parameters:
        solrQuery - a object representing the text query to execute.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterable object.

      • get

        public com.tinkerpop.blueprints.CloseableIterable<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge> get(java.lang.String key,
                                                                                     java.lang.Object value,
                                                                                     java.lang.Class dtClass,
                                                                                     boolean acceptWildcard)
        Gets all edges indexed by the provided key/value.
        Specified by:
        get in interface OracleIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
        Specified by:
        get in class SolrIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the indexed edges.
        value - the value of the indexed edges.
        dtClass - the class representing the datatype of the property value. This can be used to cast the property value to a different datatype. For example, if the value is "3.01" and dtClass is Float.Class, then this value will be treated as a 3.01f.
        acceptWildcard - specifies if wild cards can be used in the value object.
        Returns:
        an iterable of edges that have a particular key/value in the index.

      • getPartitioned

        public com.tinkerpop.blueprints.CloseableIterable<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>[] getPartitioned(java.lang.Object[] connections,
                                                                                                  java.lang.Object solrQuery,
                                                                                                  int startShardId)
        Gets an array of CloseableIterable objects that hold all the elements with an attribute matching the given K/V pair. Each element in the CloseableIterable array uses a separate connection provided to fetch a subset of the results from a corresponding SolrCloud shard. Note that we assign an integer ID (in the range of [0, N - 1]) to all the shards in a SolrCloud cluster with N shards. The subset of shards queried will consist of those shards with ID value in the range of [startShardId, startShardId - 1 + size of connections array].
        Specified by:
        getPartitioned in interface OracleIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
        Specified by:
        getPartitioned in class SolrIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
        Parameters:
        connections - an array of connections to the SolrCloud. Each element of this array should be of type CloudSolrServer. See SolrIndex.getCloudSolrServer(long).
        solrQuery - a SolrQuery object.
        startShardId - the ID of the starting shard.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterable object.

      • getPartitioned

        public com.tinkerpop.blueprints.CloseableIterable<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>[] getPartitioned(java.lang.Object[] connections,
                                                                                                  java.lang.String key,
                                                                                                  java.lang.Object value,
                                                                                                  java.lang.Class dtClass,
                                                                                                  boolean acceptWildcard,
                                                                                                  int startShardId)
        Gets an array of CloseableIterable objects that hold all the elements with an attribute matching the given K/V pair. Each element in the CloseableIterable array uses a separate connection provided to fetch a subset of the results from a corresponding SolrCloud shard. Note that we assign an integer ID (in the range of [0, N - 1]) to all the shards in a SolrCloud cluster with N shards. The subset of shards queried will consist of those shards with ID value in the range of [startShardId, startShardId - 1 + size of connections array].
        Specified by:
        getPartitioned in interface OracleIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
        Specified by:
        getPartitioned in class SolrIndex<com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge>
        Parameters:
        connections - an array of connections to the SolrCloud. Each element of this array should be of type CloudSolrServer. See SolrIndex.getCloudSolrServer(long).
        key - the key of a property
        value - the value object of the property.
        dtClass - the class representing the datatype of the property value. This can be used to cast the property value to a different datatype. For example, if the value is "3.01" and dtClass is Float.Class, then this value will be treated as a 3.01f.
        acceptWildcard - specifies if wild cards can be used in the value object.
        startShardId - the ID of the starting shard.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterable object.
